original_text: The people of the half-tribe of Manasseh were numerous; they settled in the land from Bashan to Baal Hermon, that is, to Senir (Mount Hermon).
korean_text: 므낫세 반 지파 자손들이 그 땅에 거주하면서 그들이 번성하여 바산에서부터 바알헤르몬과 스닐과 헤르몬 산까지 다다랐으며

sentences.original_text: The people of the half-tribe of Manasseh were numerous
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세 반 지파의 백성은 수가 많았으며

sentences.original_text: they settled in the land from Bashan to Baal Hermon
